zh.title: 新西兰航空901号班机在南极洲坠毁
布林克装甲车抢劫案在美国发生
美国与欧洲航天局签署空间站合作协议
印度教狂热分子拆毁阿约提亚清真寺
托尼·布莱尔成为首位在爱尔兰议会发表演讲的英国首相
协和飞机完成最后一次飞行
孟买发生恐怖袭击事件
美国国家航空航天局发射好奇号火星车
阿尔巴尼亚发生6.4级地震

en.title: Air New Zealand Flight 901 crashed into Mount Erebus, Antarctica.
Brink's-MAT robbery occurred at Heathrow Airport.
Margaret Thatcher resigned as Prime Minister of the UK.
Boris Yeltsin decreed the Communist Party illegal in Russia.
Tony Blair became the first serving British Prime Minister to address the Irish Parliament.
Terrorist attacks in Mumbai, India began.
NASA's Mars Science Laboratory (Curiosity rover) launched.
An earthquake struck Albania, killing dozens.
India successfully launched Chandrayaan-4, landing on the far side of the moon.
